attributes.action: Ban Financial institutions form carrying out credit checks on prospective employees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Financial Institutions are abusing their power by carrying out credit checks on prospective employees.

We find this discriminatory and unnessasary as any illegal as any fraud convictions would show up on a criminal record check.

It does not affect a persons ability to do the job if during periods of unemployment and hardship they are unable to keep up payments.

banks and finacial companies should be encouraging these people back into work, so they can resume their payments which would benifit all concerned.

These checks are only allowed to carry out these checks in security specific roles, However banks are doing these checks on all employees.
